title: Steamed sea bass with black beans
ingredients: ['115 g (4 oz) dried black beans, soaked for at least 8 hours', '4 sea bass fillets, about 550 g (1Â¼ lb) in total, skin on', '1 tbsp rice wine', '1 tbsp sunflower oil', '1 garlic clove, crushed', '2 shallots, finely chopped', '2.5 cm (1 in) piece of fresh root ginger, finely chopped', '4 tbsp vegetable stock', '2 tbsp light soy sauce', '2 tbsp dry sherry', '2 tsp soft light brown sugar', '1 tsp cornflour', 'salt and pepper', 'chopped fresh coriander or flat-leaf parsley, plus sprigs, to garnish']
